characters.name: Tanjiro Kamado
characters.description: Is the main protagonist of Demon Slayer. He joined…ck into a human and to hunt down and kill demons.
characters.quote: Work at it. All I can do is work hard! That´s the story of my life!

characters.name: Nezuko Kamado
characters.description: She is a demon and the younger sister of Tanjiro K… and transformed into a demon by Muzan Kibutsuji.
characters.quote: Humans are to be protected and saved... I will never hurt them.

characters.name: Giyu Tomioka
characters.description: He is a Demon Slayer of the Demon Slayer Corps and…d personality and a very strong sense of justice.
characters.quote: Feel the rage. The powerful, pure rage of not bein…will become your unswerving drive to take action.

characters.name: Sakonji Urokodaki
characters.description: Sakonji Urokodaki is a retired member of the Demon…Makomo, Sabito, Giyu Tomioka, and Tanjiro Kamado.
characters.quote: Remember to take a long breath so the oxygen flows into every cell in your body.

characters.name: Sabito
characters.description: Sabito was a former apprentice of Sakonji Urokodak…in his preparations for the Final Selection exam.
characters.quote: You have to make sure you never forget any of the …ught you! Pound it into the marrow of your bones!

characters.name: Makomo
characters.description: Makomo and Sabito were both orphaned from their re…to attend the Demon Slayer Corps´Final Selection.
characters.quote: Train until it kills you. Because really, when you get down to it, there´s nothing else you can do.

characters.name: Hand Demon
characters.description: The Hand Demon was the primary antagonist of the F…illed thirteen of Sakonji Urokodaki´s apprentices
characters.quote: I´ve been here so long... that dynasties have rise…ve been trapped here! Unforgivable! Unforgivable!

characters.name: Genya Shinazugawa
characters.description: He is the younger brother of the Wind Hashira and … Slayer even without utilizing a Breathing Style.
characters.quote: I´ll do it. I´m gonna do it. I have to do it. Thin…brother, or my master, or any of my comrades die!

characters.name: Zenitsu Agatsuma
characters.description: Zenitsu Agatsuma is one of the main characters of …is also a Demon Slayer in the Demon Slayer Corps.
characters.quote: I hate myself more than anyone. I always think I h… want to change. I want to be a competent person.

characters.name: Inosuke Hashibira
characters.description: Inosuke is short-tempered, confrontational, abrasi…g others to respect and praise him for his skill.
characters.quote: Everything that dies returns to the earth, but cry…so no matter how frusturated you feel, don´t cry!

characters.name: Muichiro Tokito
characters.description: He is the Mist Hashira and despite his awkward and…ink only for himself and operates on logic alone
characters.quote: Even if I lose my memories, my body will remember …to destroy demons. And more... to eradicate them!

characters.name: Gyomei Himejima
characters.description: He is a Demon Slayer of the Demon Slayer Corps and…st Demon Slayer in the entire Demon Slayer Corps.
characters.quote: We are proud to live and die as human beings. Don´…hless ideas are supreme and force them on others.

characters.name: Obanai Iguro
characters.description: He is a Demon Slayer of the Demon Slayer Corps and…not abide by the rules of the Demon Slayer Corps.
characters.quote: I want to die defeating Muzan, and I pray that it …t demons, I will tell you of my feelings for you.

characters.name: Sanemi Shinazugawa
characters.description: He is a Demon Slayer of the Demon Slayer Corps and…osing too many people he cared about in the past.
characters.quote: I know how unfair the world is... because good people... die one after another.

characters.name: Enmu
characters.description: He was a demon affiliated with the Twelve Demon Mo…hing the strength of the Upper Ranks Demon Moons.
characters.quote: All human hearts are the same. So fragile and weak, like glasswork.

characters.name: Murata
characters.description: Not much is known about Murata, however, he does n…hat timid, however he does seem braver than most.
characters.quote: Tomioka remembered my name... We were together sin…between us but we were in the same batch, man...!

characters.name: Spider Son
characters.description: He was member of the Spider Family, and he takes t…in and hair similar to his "younger brother" Rui.
characters.quote: There´s nothing to be afraid of. When the poison r… and you become a spider, your mind will be gone.

characters.name: Spider Daughter
characters.description: She was member of the Spider Family, and she is sh…jump right into the battle against Demon Slayers.
characters.quote: I only ever worried about myself. They were dumb, but I was different. But now I´ve messed up!

characters.name: Spider Mother
characters.description: She was member of the Spider Family. Like most dem…ads and manipulated them into killing each other.
characters.quote: Arrgh! Die! Die! Die now! If you don´t, I´ll suffer an awful fate!

characters.name: Spider Father
characters.description: He was member of the Spider Family. Physically, he…ing great height and a powerfully built physique.
characters.quote: Stay away... from... my... family!

characters.name: Yushiro
characters.description: He only cares for Tamayo and hates when others get in the way of his spending time with her
characters.quote: Someone who never gives to others will someday become unable to receive anything from them.

characters.name: Susamaru
characters.description: Susamaru, also known as the Temari Demon, was one …eving she was a member of the Twelve Demon Moons.
characters.quote: Let´s keep playing until dawn! Until your life ends

characters.name: Yahaba
characters.description: Yahaba, also known as the Arrow Demon, was one of …ieving he was a member of the Twelve Demon Moons.
characters.quote: How will we kill them? Brutally of course!

characters.name: Kyogai
characters.description: Kyogai was a demon formerly affiliated with the Tw… demon and losing his ability to become stronger.
characters.quote: Demons... Exist for a purpose.

characters.name: Shinobu Kocho
characters.description: Shinobu is the current Insect Hashira. After a dem…otect others from suffering the same fate as her.
characters.quote: I once believed that the road of happiness continu…rst time that it lies upon a thin sheet of glass.

characters.name: Rui
characters.description: Rui is the leader of the Spider Family. He was the…on Moons, holding the position of Lower Rank Five
characters.quote: Since I was the one with the most power, there was…ecame, the less I remembered about being a human.

characters.name: Kagaya Ubuyashiki
characters.description: He is the 97th leader of the Demon Slayer Corps kn…rs and is also the head of the Ubuyashiki Family.
characters.quote: I know what eternity is. Eternity is human feeling…Only human feelings last forever and are undying.

characters.name: Tengen Uzui
characters.description: Tengen is the Sound Hashira of the Demon Slayer Co…need for everything to be flashy and outstanding.
characters.quote: I am a god! You three are trash! That´s the first …nkeys if I say so! And let me repeat! I am a god!

characters.name: Mitsuri Kanroji
characters.description: Mitsuri is the Love Hashira of the Demon Slayer Co… Mitsuri will show no mercy in the face of demons
characters.quote: Is it okay for a girl to be this strong? I still …ymore. Leave this to me. I will protect everyone.

characters.name: Kyojuro Rengoku
characters.description: Kyojuro Rengoku, the Flame Hashira, possesses exce…es and showcasing his mastery of Flame Breathing.
characters.quote: Life is a series of decisions. You never have unli…t you choose in that instant defines who you are.

characters.name: Aoi Kanzaki
characters.description: Aoi Kanzaki is a Demon Slayer of the Demon Slayer …an taking to the front lines and fighting demons.
characters.quote: Compared to you guys, I´m not so important, so tha… then I´ve been afraid to fight, so I´m a coward.

characters.name: Kanao Tsuyuri
characters.description: Kanao Tsuyuri is the adopted sister of Shinobu and… path to follow when she doesn´t know what to do.
characters.quote: Somehow I feel the people I care for and those imp…e´s no way I can promise that with any certainty.

characters.name: Swamp Demon
characters.description: He is the main antagonist of the Kidnapper´s Bog A…ion of Tanjiro Kamado for the Demon Slayer Corps.
characters.quote: Don´t interfere! You´ll ruin the girl´s freshness!…less and less tasty with each moment that passes!

characters.name: Muzan Kibutsuji
characters.description: Muzan Kibutsuji is the main antagonist of Demon Sl…twelve strongest demons under his direct command.
characters.quote: The one thing I hate is "change". Changes in circu… change for an eternity. It´s in a perfect state.

characters.name: Tamayo
characters.description: Tamayo is a gentle, wise, and incredibly intellige…ching of demons and human transformation into one
characters.quote: I don´t need to be stronger than you to kill you. …... No, we, will do whatever it takes to kill you

characters.name: Gyokko
characters.description: He is a demon affiliated with the Twelve Demon Moo…times even going against his initial impressions.
characters.quote: Hyo, hyo! What a childish provocation! Did you thi…h prattle? You seem desperate. It´s embarrassing.

characters.name: Hotaru Haganezuka
characters.description: He is a swordsmith affiliated with the Demon Slaye…e creates. His passion for swords is very strong.
characters.quote: I don´t care! That doesn´t matter! It´s your fault…, would my katana break?! I am going to kill you!

characters.name: Nakime
characters.description: She is a demon who owns and controls the Infinity …tening and following his every order faultlessly.
characters.quote: ... I decline.

characters.name: Kokushibo
characters.description: He is a demon affiliated with the Twelve Denon Moo…e and knowledge over his near 500-year long life.
characters.quote: You opened a path... to reach further heights.... and you abandoned it.... So weak.

characters.name: Yoriichi
characters.description: He is a Demon Slayer who lived nearly 500 years ag… most powerful Demon Slayer to have ever existed.
characters.quote: My dream was to live a quiet life with my family i… come true. Demons exist in this beautiful world.

characters.name: Akaza
characters.description: He is a demon affiliated with the Twelve Demon Moo…t in existence, after Doma, Kokushibo, and Muzan.
characters.quote: You misunderstand, Tanjiro. I only despise the wea…y spit on weaklings. Yes. Weaklings make me sick.

characters.name: Daki
characters.description: She is a demon affiliated with the Twelve Demon Mo…th the primary holder, her older brother Gyutaro.
characters.quote: Demons never grow old. And they don´t need money t…iful, powerful demons... can do anything we want!

characters.name: Gyutaro
characters.description: As the real Upper Rank Six, Gyutaro was an extreme…having killed and devoured 15 Hashira in the past
characters.quote: The sufferings of my past were lessons on what to …y own unhappiness, I´ll never balance the scales!

characters.name: Doma
characters.description: He is a demon affiliated with the Twelve Demon Moo…, possessing an approachable and charismatic air.
characters.quote: You know, everyone´s afraid of dying. And that´s w…. Now they get to live together with me. Forever.

characters.name: Hantengu
characters.description: He is a demon affiliated with the Twelve Demon Moo…ious evidence pointing toward his numerous crimes
characters.quote: You brutal fiends who torment the weak... Atrociou…ve... to the extreme. Damn you, awful villains...
